modName: MAK07s Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M - Non Nude By Joseph Anthony
summary:
This mod extends Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK07 with the intent to
edit any armor sets that show nude anatomy.
descriptionHtml:
MAK07\'s Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M - Non Nude Version By Joseph Anthony
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Please endorse if you like this mod! 

!!! All skirt/shorts images are a work in progress.  They aren\'t available for download yet !!!

CREDIT

I want to start off by thanking MAK07 for taking the time and effort
to remodel the vanilla equipment and for allowing other modders to 
build upon his work.



REQUIREMENTS

- Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M By MAK07 is required for this mod to work.
LINK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004



DESCRIPTION 

This mod extends Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK07 with the intent to
edit any armor sets that show nude anatomy. This usually occurs when
the weight slider is nearly maxed out or higher. My purpose in making
the mod was because I wanted to set the weight slider to full, but
didn\'t really want to see breasts all the time. If this sounds like
you, then you\'ll probably like what I\'ve done here.

This mod has the further goal of eventually adding matching skirts
to every armor type, and possibly other inner-wear garments over time.

This mod includes two separate versions. The first is a version where
the added components utilize lore friendly textures (completely custom
made for this mod and designed to be in line with the armor\'s style). 
If you are a purist of sorts, I recommend that version. The second is 
a kinkier fetish version, for people who like shiny stuff and don\'t 
mind that it isn\'t really lore friendly. Only use one!!! 



WHY IS THIS NECESSARY?

You may ask, \"why not just add an additional armor piece that can be
worn in an extra equipment slot to use as an undergarment?\" There
are a few reasons. The first is that wearing an additional armor 
piece can mess with the armor perks in the game (dependent on the armor
type of the piece added). The second is that if an extra generic 
undergarment item was worn, you would experience heavy clipping on at 
least some armor sets since they are fitted and the undergarment requires
modeling for each specific set. The third is that this is just less 
in-game hassle and will produce a better result.



PLANNED UPDATES

As stated above, this mod has the goal of eventually adding matching skirts
to every armor type, and possibly other inner-wear garments over time
(such as pants or other underwear). The first goal however is to revise
all armor sets that show upper body nudity.



CURRENT ARMOR SETS COMPLETED (TOPS ONLY)

Studded 
Studded Imperial 
Steel A
Steel B 
Dwarven 
Dragonscale
Falmer
Scaled Armor
Scaled Horn Armor
Dragonplate
Ebony Mail
Forsworn Armor

^ Using 54 custom hand-made textures



YET TO BE COMPLETED

Skirts for all armor sets



INSTALLATION

- Download and install a version of Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M By MAK07 
LINK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
- Choose a version of this mod (Lore Friendly or Fetish) 
- Move the files located in the archive to your Skyrim \'data\' directory 
- When prompted if you want to overwrite files, choose Yes.



CHANGELOG

v 1.04 - Added Forsworn and Ebony Mail tops and textures.
v 1.031 - Fixed a missing texture on the Dragonplate armor.
v 1.03 - Added tops and textures for Dragonplate, Scaled, and Scaled 
         Horn armors.  Added revised textures and a new reflection map
         for all fetish models.  Added revised textures for studded
         and steel armors (lore version).  
v 1.02 - Added tops and textures for Dragonscale and Falmer armors.
v 1.01 - Fixed some bogus mesh file paths in the archive.
v 1.0 - Initial Release



BARELY RELATED GARBAGE

If you like my mods, perhaps you\'ll enjoy my other artwork -- music. 
Check me out on SoundCloud at http://soundcloud.com/joseph_anthony,
my band Common Man Down at http://facebook.com/commonmandown,
and keep an eye out for an upcoming Skyrim mod scored completely by
yours truly.
author: Joseph Anthony
